meanings.definition: Not offering any resistance or opposition.
meanings.sent1: The sleepy cat was unresisting when picked up.
meanings.sent2: The unresisting clouds floated lazily across the sky.
meanings.sent3: The unresisting pillow welcomed me with open arms.
meanings.sent4: The unresisting river flowed gently towards the sea.
meanings.sent5: The unresisting flower petals fell gracefully to the ground.

meanings.sent1: The unresisting student followed the teacher's instructions without question.
meanings.sent2: The unresisting tree branches swayed in the breeze.
meanings.sent3: The unresisting dough eagerly accepted the shaping hands of the baker.
meanings.sent4: The unresisting wind carried the kite high into the sky.
meanings.sent5: The unresisting soil absorbed the rain like a thirsty sponge.
